name: Space Fighter (itch) (ksiam001)
description:
The game is a space exploration adventure that you fly in an imaginary galaxy trying to save the planets from asteroids and enemy spaceships.
You can shoot your laser cannons to destroy the asteroids and enemies in your way to achieve a high score. Watch out for the asteroids they can damage your aircraft and cost you your life if your armour reduced!

Watch the GamePlay Video for a taste.

Have a good trip to space explore! Game Away!
